trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGWILREDUCE_00276_TALK_A2<tab>What items are suited for aetherial reduction?
TEXT_REGWILREDUCE_00276_KOKOSAMU_000_000<tab>Like I said before, it's a method o' reducin' certain items to their base aetherial components. Crystals, mostly, but occasionally other rare materials.

TEXT_REGWILREDUCE_00276_KOKOSAMU_000_001<tab>Not just any items, mind─collectables. Ain't easy to get yer hands on such rarities as it is, so ye'd best refer to yer logs to make sure yer lookin' in the right place.
TEXT_REGWILREDUCE_00276_KOKOSAMU_000_010<tab>Well...if it ain't a collectable, ye can't reduce it, so there's that.

TEXT_REGWILREDUCE_00276_KOKOSAMU_000_011<tab>Also, while any ol' collectable can be reduced, ye'll get far better yields from ones with especially high collectability. 'Course, that means you'll have to part ways with it, but I needn't remind you of the obvious, eh?
